data.title: QUALCOMM Incorporated (QCOM) Gains Analyst Confidence as AI and Data Center Strategy Accelerates
data.description: Qualcomm Inc. (NASDAQ:QCOM) is one of the best augmented reality stocks to buy right now. On November 20, JPMorgan analyst Samik Chatterjee reiterated a Buy rating on Qualcomm Inc. (NASDAQ:QCOM), impressed by the company’s diversification efforts into the Automotive and IoT sectors. The diversification drive has resulted in impressive growth with compound annual growth exceeding […]
data.keywords: Qualcomm Inc, AI company, diversification efforts, AI stock, data center
